rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A small entry area with a foyer and coat closet; designed to set the tone while providing storage.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall facing the pool area; natural light and views are maximized.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for a seamless flow; designed for both everyday meals and entertaining.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient layout with storage spaces and integrated island; budget-friendly fixtures to maximize cost-effectiveness.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom for visitors; includes a sink, toilet, and minimalistic shower area.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Access
rooms.description: A covered transitional space leading to the backyard swimming pool; ensures privacy while integrating outdoor leisure.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window providing expansive view of the garden and pool area.
Main entrance door leading to foyer; designed with security and aesthetic appeal in mind.
Large windows that let in natural light while offering a view of the adjacent garden.
Swing door to allow fluid transition between living and dining areas.
Small window for natural lighting, complementing the interior design.
